overview: AIRANI (16) is a teenage prostitute who is pregnant and living alone in a flat. She wants to end her life by committing suicide in her room. However, AIRANI meets DIANDRA (6), a small child whose presence greatly disturbs AIRANI. With his innocence and curiosity as a child, DIANDRA asks many questions about AIRANIâ€™s life and why AIRANI wants to commit suicide while pregnant. The longer DIANDRA is around AIRANI delays her plan to commit suicide. Finally, AIRANI tries to push DIANDRA away
title: Airani
